pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, June 25, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, June 25, 2017:

Toronto, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Faith + Pride service.

Church Street Public School
83 Alexander Street
Toronto, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will participate in the Toronto Pride Parade.


Media appearance

An interview with the Prime Minister for James Rhodes’ feature “Canada 150: Geeking Glenn Gould’’ will air on BBC Radio 3 at 6:45 p.m. GMT
